statements: SELECT * FROM demography_data LIMIT 10
SELECT id, age, location FROM demography_data WHERE gender='Male'
SELECT id, age, location, income FROM demography_data ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT id, gender, income FROM demography_data WHERE location='New York'
SELECT * FROM demography_data WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40
SELECT * FROM demography_data WHERE age < 30 ORDER BY income DESC, location ASC;
SELECT id, age, income FROM demography_data WHERE location LIKE 'New%' AND income > 50000;
SELECT gender, AVG(age) AS avg_age, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM demography_data GROUP BY gender;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM demography_data GROUP BY location HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY total_records DESC;
SELECT id, age, location, gender, income FROM demography_data WHERE income BETWEEN 50000 AND 100000 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT id, age, location FROM demographics;
SELECT id, age, location FROM demographics ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT id, age, location FROM demographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT id, age, location FROM demographics WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT id, age, location FROM demographics JOIN population ON demographics.id = population.id;
SELECT * FROM demographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, location FROM population WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_population FROM population WHERE age BETWEEN 18 AND 60 GROUP BY location ORDER BY location;
SELECT location, AVG(age) AS avg_age FROM demographics GROUP BY location HAVING AVG(age) > 25;
SELECT id, location, population_size FROM population WHERE population_size > 100000 ORDER BY population_size DESC, id ASC;
SELECT * FROM demographics;
SELECT age, location FROM demographics;
SELECT city, population_size FROM population;
SELECT * FROM trends WHERE trend_type = 'population_growth';
SELECT id, age, trend_value FROM trends WHERE age > 30;
SELECT id, age, location FROM demographics WHERE age >= 30
SELECT city, state, population_size FROM population WHERE population_size > 1000000 ORDER BY population_size DESC
SELECT id, age, location, trend_type, trend_value FROM trends WHERE age < 40 AND trend_type = 'population_growth'
SELECT id, location FROM demographics WHERE location LIKE '%New York%' OR location LIKE '%California%' ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT city, population_size FROM population WHERE state = 'Texas' AND population_size BETWEEN 500000 AND 1000000
SELECT * FROM demographic_data;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM demographic_data WHERE age > 30;
SELECT location_name, city, state, country FROM location_data ORDER BY country ASC;
SELECT age_group, total_population, median_income FROM age_statistics WHERE total_population > 100000;
SELECT id, age_group, total_population, median_income FROM demographic_trends WHERE location_id = '12345-67890';
SELECT * FROM demographic_data ORDER BY age DESC, name ASC;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM demographic_data WHERE gender = 'Male' and age > 30;
SELECT location_name, city, state FROM location_data WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY city ASC;
SELECT age_group, total_population, median_income FROM age_statistics WHERE total_population > 100000 ORDER BY median_income DESC;
SELECT dt.location_id, dt.age_group, dt.total_population, ld.location_name FROM demographic_trends dt JOIN location_data ld ON dt.location_id = ld.id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, occupation FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, location, age FROM demographics WHERE age < 30;
SELECT location_name, country FROM locations WHERE region = 'Asia';
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date, amount FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT id, name, age, location FROM customers WHERE age >= 25 AND occupation='Engineer';
SELECT purchase_date, amount, customer_id FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT location_name, region, country FROM locations WHERE region='Asia';
SELECT * FROM demographics WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 40 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_spent FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 1000;
